segments.text: Ugh, what a sloppy mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, water pouring down like a waterfall onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman's just standing there, clueless with her wet feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate while everything floodsâ€”how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that rickety stool, probably covered in crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, begging for her turn in the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, so slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't save this disgusting scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing food stolen like that, it's just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to be soaked and ruined soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
